title: Walter Grant (Scottish footballer)
text:
Walter A. Grant was a Scottish professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> midfielder who played for Scottish clubs <a href="Aberdeen%20F.C.">Aberdeen</a> and <a href="Raith%20Rovers%20F.C.">Raith Rovers</a>, and English club <a href="Crystal%20Palace%20F.C.">Crystal Palace</a>.
Grant joined Aberdeen in 1915. His career was interrupted by <a href="World%20War%20I">the Great War</a> in 1916, but resumed in 1919. He played exactly 100 games for Aberdeen before leaving to join <a href="Raith%20Rovers%20F.C.">Raith Rovers</a> in 1925. After leaving Raith Rovers, he signed for Crystal Palace in 1926 and spent two seasons there before leaving in 1928.
